short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide all text in order to make the WEB beautiful

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to toggle the visibility of a text within the browser. 

Just click on the App icon (in the toolbar, letter A) and all text will disappear, click again - and all text will show up again.

Awesome!

Source code: https://github.com/nettsundere/TextBlock (MIT)
